alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Hamilton; Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 16 at 1:48PM EDT until May 16 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN HAMILTON...NORTHWESTERN FULTON AND SOUTHEASTERN HERKIMER COUNTIES... At 148 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Stratford, or 10 miles northeast of Little Falls, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Dolgeville, Stratford, Oregon, Powley Place, Nobleboro, Curtis, Wood Corners, Knappville, Paper Mill Corners, Burrell Corners, Shedd Corners, Salisbury Center, Fairview Corners and Ives Hollow. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
